name: Press It! (Fantorim)
description:
Welcome too: Press It!

The game speaks for itself, doesn't it? Just Press It!

But in all truth, I made this game because while making Rob & Bobberts I had trouble with making the UI, so I made a game solely based in the unity UI. I also challenged myself to make it within a short amount of time, so the game was made within 2 hours. It might not be a game you can play for hours, but if you have a few minutes to spare, try it!

Also, if you want the Pixel Font, it is Thaleah by Tiny Worlds
